courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Offered Spring terms only. Prerequisite: GRKM 453 or consent of instructor.
description: Continued practice to enable students to improve their fluency and use Modern Greek effectively in a variety of contexts. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Offered Spring terms only. Prerequisite: GRKM 453 or consent of instructor.
label: Advanced Modern Greek II
